```{r}
top40 <- readRDS("input/top40.rds")
top2000 <- readRDS("input/top2000.rds")

customdtfunc <- function(dataframe){
  datatable(dataframe, 
            options = list(
              pageLength = 40,
              lengthMenu = c(10,40,100)
            ),
            class = "cell-border",
            rownames = F,
            filter = "top",
            style = "bootstrap"
  )
}
```
